title: Kaattu vazhi pora ponney Lyrics Mambatiyan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Lyrics : Vairamuthu
Singer(s) : - Version 1 - Naveen
                    Version 2 - Thiagarajan
                    Remix - Simbu

Kaattu vazhi pora penney
Kavala padadhey,
Kaattu Puli Vazhi marikkum...
Kalangi nikkaadhey (2)

Mambattiyan peru sonna
puli udhavum paaru
Enga Mambattiyan peru sonna
puli udhavum paaru   (Kaattu vazhi......)

8-tu thala vetti vachaan
sandhayila kotti vachaan
kodumaya katti vachaan
verrena micham vachaan
Mullu mela thaan paduthaan
ezhaikellaam poo virichaan
Aththi malapaara innum pesudhavan pera
Andha, Aththi malapaara
innum pesudhavan pera (Kaattu vazhi......)

Kannaatha vazha vandhaa, Mambattiyaan kooda vandhaa
Thaalikava aasai pattaa, thunbathuku vaaka pattaa
Sorgathuku serndhu vara, utharavu vaangiputta
Enna kadhaiyaachu ava idupodinja naathu
Emmaa, Enna kadhaiyaachu
ava idupodinja naathu (Kaattu vazhi......)

Thangam pola varrnamadi, ullikotta sornamadi
Pathupera paatha padi,pathinithaan mathapadi
Mambatiyaan saagayila thaan uysura vitavadi
Maadhaviya pirandha ava kannagiya irandhaa
Maadhaviya pirandha ava kannagiya irandhaa (Kaattu vazhi......)

Mambattiyaan Peru solla naavu konjam koosu dhada
5-u mara thoppu kulla aavi vandhu pesudhada
Mambattiyaan veeram enga saathi sanam kaakumada
Mambattiyaan pechu adhu seema varapochu
Enga, Mambattiyaan pechu adhu seema varapochu

seo.title: Kaattu vazhi pora ponney Lyrics Mambatiyan Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Kaattu vazhi pora ponney Lyrics Mambatiyan Song Lyrics from Mambattiyan. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Thaman S and sung by Simbu. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Mambattiyan, Thaman S, Simbu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
